directions: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Beat in the peanut butter. Fold in 1 container of whipped topping. Spread filling in baked pie shell. Chill for 1 hour.
Spread top with remaining container of whipped topping. Refrigerate 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) containers frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Peanut Butter Pie XIX
